amendment.description: Relating to the Protect America Act of 2015.

action.text: Amendment SA 2912 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2912 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 318.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(c) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2912.
Amendment SA 2912 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2874. (consideration: CR S8345-8346) Relating to the Protect America Act of 2015.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2912 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 318.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2912 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2874.
